extDescription.message: Focus on providing a great inline web translation experience.

extCallOutCommandDescription.message: Call out extension in web page

extToggleAutoInsertResultDescription.message: Toggle the option of "insert translate results in web pages automatically"

extOpenWithPdfViewerDescription.message: Open this page with PDF viewer

optionsTranslateWithKeyPress.message: Press "Ctrl" key and select text to translate

optionsEnablePdfViewerDescription.message: When you enable this option, this extension will redirect the URL of all PDF files. With the PDF viewer, this extension can be used on PDF files. If you want to enable this extension for local PDF files as well, check "Allow access to file URLs" in extension management.

optionsPreferredLanguageDescription.message: When the target language of translation is "auto", it will be translated into the "preferred language". When the language of the text is the same as the "preferred language", it will be translated into "second preferred Language".

optionsCallOutCommandDescription.message: You can call out extension in web page when the extension is enabled in web page with this keyboard shortcut. When you click this keyboard shortcut with the extension called out, it focuses on the text box.

optionsTheFixedTimeOfHidingButton.message: The fixed time of hiding button

optionsRememberStwSizeAndPosition.message: Remember separate translate window's size and position

optionsStwDescription.message: The separate translate window uses the "Multiple translate mode" translate panel, which shares the same set of translation settings. The separate translate window can also respond to keyboard shortcuts.

optionsPinThePanelWhileOpeningIt.message: Pin the panel while opening it

optionsPinThePanelWhileOpeningItDescript.message: The panel will be pinned automatically while translating or the shortcut of "Call out extension in web page" is used.

optionsRememberPositionOfPinnedPanel.message: Remember the position of the pinned panel

optionsRememberPositionOfPinnedPanelDesc.message: When you click the pin icon in the unpinned state of the panel, it will automatically move to the last pinned position. Moving the panel in the pinned state will automatically synchronize the current position to all pages.

optionsStwAutoRespondDescription.message: Separate translate window will auto respond to the translate request which you click the "translate" item of context menus in the extension unavailable page.

optionsRememberHistoryPanelStatus.message: Remember the status of translate history panel

optionsTranslateDirectlyWhilePinning.message: Translate directly while translate panel pinning

optionsDoNotRespondInTextBox.message: Do not respond in text box

optionsDoNotRespondInTextBoxDescription.message: Extension will not show button and will not auto translate if you select some text in text box.

optionsAutoTranslateAfterInput.message: Auto translate after input in input box

optionsAutoTranslateAfterInputDescriptio.message: Extension will send a translate request automatically with the text you input in input box in 0.6s. If you disable it, you will need to use "Ctrl + Enter" keyboard shortcut to trigger the translate request.

optionsAllowExtensionToReadClipboardDesc.message: Some features require you to allow the extension to read the clipboard to get the lase text. For example: Paste in the input box automatically.

optionsReadClipboardAutomatically.message: Paste in the input box automatically

optionsReadClipboardAutomaticallyDescrip.message: The last clipboard text will be automatically pasted in the input box while opening popup page or separate translate window.

optionsEnableInsertResult.message: Allow extension to insert translate results in web pages

optionsEnableInsertResultDescription.message: When you enable this option and the result can be inserted, there will be an "insert" icon behind the translate result. After clicking the icon, extension will insert the translate result behind the text you selected. Clicking the icon again will remove the previously inserted translate result.

optionsBeta.message: This function may not be fully developed, and there may be compatibility and destructive issues. If you want to report a bug or make a feature suggestion, please contact the developer.

optionsAutoInsertResult.message: Insert translate results in web pages automatically

optionsAutoInsertResultDescription.message: After enabling this option, the extension will insert translate result in web page automatically when the translate request is completed and can be inserted. You can toggle this option through "Toggle the option of 'insert translate results in web pages automatically'" keyboard shortcut.

optionsTextPreprocessingDescription.message: The text you want to translate will be processed before sending a translate request.

optionsReplaceWithRegExpDescription.message: Use regular expressions to match the string you want to match, and replace the matched string with the string you want to replace. If you are not familiar with regular expressions, you are not recommended to write your own regular expressions.

optionsTestSomeTextDescription.message: After entering the text in the text box on the left below, the processed text will be displayed in the text box on the right.

optionsCustomizeStyleDescription.message: The CSS you input here will inject in all page except the options page.

optionsCustomizeStyleNotice.message: Notice: there is no guarantee that elements or class names wil not be changed. Once elements or class names are changed, the CSS you input might cause "style disorder", then, you might need to adjust the CSS you input here.

contentSwitchDisplayModeOfResult.message: Switch the display mode of translate results

contextMenus_OPEN_THIS_PAGE_WITH_PDF_VIE.message: Open this page with PDF viewer

errorCode_RESULT_ERROR.message: Error: Server return an unexpected result.

errorCode_LANGUAGE_NOT_SOPPORTED.message: Error: The translate source doesn't support this language.

errorCode_EXTENSION_UPDATED.message: Error: Extension might be updated, try refreshing page to reactivate extension.
